website_summaries.verdict: Uses mixture of boar bristles and nylon pins for best results. Works on wet and dry hair equally well.
pros: Wooden brush handle w/rectangular shape is easy to use and has sturdy design
Popular among people with long, thick hair
Packaging works well for storage or for gifting the brush
cons: Needs frequent cleaning to remove hair care products
Brush has odd odor out of box

customer_reviews.title: Love this brush!
customer_reviews.text: I have waist length, wavy, very fine textured hair which knots up if you look at it sideways, so brushing and combing has always resulted in lots of ouchies and broken hair. I was almost at the point of just cutting it off when I came across the listing for this brush. I've been using it for several days now and I have to say it's been awesome! I can actually get the tangles out SO much quicker and easier, with far less breakage. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: RB

customer_reviews.title: Works great for fine hair!
customer_reviews.text: I never blew dry my hair, so never really had to be too picky about my hair brush. Since I have gotten it colored though, blow drying has become a necessity so I checked out a couple of different brushes. The one I have been using works great for getting knots out first and then I continue to brush and blow dry my hair with this great brush. I was worried that it would pull too hard on my hair while combing through, but it's surprisingly very gentle and does a great job of grabbing the hair and brushing through it. It came with a wooden comb which my boyfriend uses. Would definitely recommend this brush!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Detangles long hair easily
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been using an old brush from Germany for awhile now. I love it but the prong tips are coming off. I’ve tried a few brushes for replacement, but this was by far the best. Real boar helps spread the oil from your scalp evenly, and makes the hair shiny and smooth. It also works with a blow dryer. There is a small odor when you first open the box but leave it out for a cpl hours and it’s fine.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin & DD

customer_reviews.title: Nice hairbrush
customer_reviews.text: This is a lovely hairbrush. It’s soft on my head and doesn’t pull my hair out. I liked it so much, I bought one for my daughter. I have lost one of the longer bristles when I was cleaning hair out of them, so I was a little disappointed with that. Otherwise I’m very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Leslie S.

customer_reviews.title: The best brush EVER!!!
customer_reviews.text: If you're questioning whether to buy this brush or not....just do it. I've bought 2 already and will buy more. (I've got 4 daughters plus myself). This brush is amazing. Makes your hair look healthy and gets tangles out Instantly. Highly recommend this brush. Wish I would've gotten one long ago.
customer_reviews.author: Kristine S.

customer_reviews.title: BEST BRUSH EVER
customer_reviews.text: First of all I got conned into spending $50 on a "high end " brush that wasn't worth $10 but then THERE IS THIS LITTLE MIRACLE! This brush comes beautifully packaged and it has a brush cleaning tool included. They also included a very luxe velvet scrunchie! The brush is light and easy to hold. I think it is very "green" to have a wooden handle and natural bristles. The brush also has tiny nylon spikes that give you the best of both worlds. The brush makes my hair shine and it is easy to clean. The brush is unique, RIDICULOUSLY affordable and works like a charm! I am ordering them as gifts for Christmas!
customer_reviews.author: pdmommy29

customer_reviews.title: Should have been able to give this one six stars!
customer_reviews.text: So... I'm fully aware that this was intended for long hair on the head... I don't have that. That being said, this brush works great for a longer beard! Never brush your beard with anything that doesn't have boar hair bristles! I was thoroughly impressed with the quality of this product. This product has improved my morning grooming routine.
customer_reviews.author: SephPorter

customer_reviews.title: Decent brush
customer_reviews.text: I like how it easily detangles my hair in contrast to a comb. I also like the surprise scrunchie it came with. The cleaning brush is nice, but I think it will bend and break after awhile, and also be ineffective if I let hair build up on the brush. I've never seen boar bristles, but the bristles on this brush has bristle that narrow along the shaft like animal hair, although that doesn't truly ensure it's genuine boar.
customer_reviews.author: Altaire

customer_reviews.title: OUTSTANDING Brush @ a Steal of a Deal, even at the regular price!!
customer_reviews.text: Oh-my-gosh, I couldn't believe my eyes upon opening the brush's own box with the flower detail on the brush & box - nice touch! Then, also included was a beautifully, wood-working of a travel-size comb with the same flower detail that instantly brought me back to my "girl-age" years - LOVE!! WOW, these people know how to impress upon first sight! And then, I TRY the Brush.......LOVELY, beautiful, PERFECT!!! The brought cleared snarls from my long hair without any pain and laid down fly-aways like no body's business, which resulted in very smooth & shiny hair ~ THANK YOU--THANK YOU for such an OUTSTANDING BRUSH and feminine additions ~ LOVING THIS :))
customer_reviews.author: PinotNoirLand

customer_reviews.title: Best brush I've had in years.
customer_reviews.text: I've been looking for a brush like this for a long time and I am extremely pleased with this particular brush. It glides through my hair leaving it shiny and smooth. I love the handle and the bristle combination... feels great on my scalp and doesn't rip hair out. I honestly haven't been this satisfied with a brush in a very long time. I will be buying brushes from Bsisme from now on.
customer_reviews.author: Shy

customer_reviews.title: My scalp is very pleased!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love my new brush! I've even purchased more as gifts. It's amazing how my scalp actually tingles after I brush my hair each night. Too bad I didn't treat myself to this until I almost reached my 70's! My grandmother taught me to brush 100 strokes when I was just a small girl and I forgot about that until I saw the ad for this awesome brush. Now i"m faithful about those 100 strokes each night. The cleaning tool works like a charm. Now I don't look at brushing my hair as a chore. Instead I look at it as a treat. Simple pleasure and not expensive too. This set does make the perfect gift.
customer_reviews.author: Happy Nana

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice Brush For The Price
customer_reviews.text: This brush has a good weight to it and was heavier than I expected. The bristles are mixed - boar and plastic pins. The pins are comfortable on your head. The boar bristles are comfortable too, and a shorter length than the plastic pins. The brush runs great through my long, fine hair. The only problem is that there is shedding from the boar bristles, but that may just be temporary because the brush is new. Mine came in a nice box with a brush cleaner brush, which is very welcomed for cleaning brushes of the type with pins. It also came with a gift - a velvet scrunchie.
customer_reviews.author: Powerpuffed

customer_reviews.title: Actually works well and does not hurt
customer_reviews.text: I have to say, this hairbrush rocks! My 3.5 year old daughter has very long (reaches her bottom), thick and wavy/curly hair. I had one of those wet brushes that didn't brush as well or get all the knots out. And I've tried using my generic hairbrush that gets the knots out with a lot of sad tears. This brush will get ALL the knots out plus it's not so harsh on her head and she doesn't cry anymore when I brush her hair. I need to buy one for myself now, I like it that much. Also, for our wavy/curly hair, it smooths our hair out nicely and feels good on our scalps.
customer_reviews.author: Luke & Ashley Andersen

customer_reviews.title: New Version Holds up much better.
customer_reviews.text: The brush is pretty great, detangles well, moves natural oils around, etc. They have a new version now that I've given a go, and the little detangler balls on the ends of the plastic bristles don't appear to be bothered by beard oils/balms. They seem to be larger than the previous version, and made of a different material. The brush is also the perfect size for beards, not too large to be ungainly, but not too small as to make it hard to detangle a section. I have an 8inch long beard that's pretty well trimmed/groomed, and this is a good complement to my morning routine required to maintain it.
customer_reviews.author: JT

customer_reviews.title: Horrible !!! Don’t buy they come used!
customer_reviews.text: Horrible !!!! It came in with hair And used ?! What is this ?! This is horrible. And missing parts as well. Gives me something else!
customer_reviews.author: Alexis Diaz

customer_reviews.title: Worth it.
customer_reviews.text: I just got this brush today on July 19, 2020. It feels amazing in my hair and very comfortable, its easy to hold comes eith a free scrounge thats super soft, also this little brush im not sure what its for but eyeah. Anyways I have medium to long curly hair, and its so hard to manage my hair sometimes and it gets tangled easy but this brush did great, I got the tangles out so easy and my hair feels softer, it feels like I'm massaging my head and hair while combing my hair with this. I love this brush, ill be ordering two more for my mother and sister.
customer_reviews.author: Crumb

customer_reviews.title: My NEW LOVE!!
customer_reviews.text: I am 51 with coarse, thick hair. I can never find conditioner to tame it, let alone a good brush.. until now. This brush is awesome. It combines boars hair & wide tooth brush all in one. When I brush my hair, I feel it reaches my scalp! WOW! Love the feeling. I also love that it's wood so it'll last me a long time. My last brush was plastic and it eventually broke at the handle in two. They thew in a nice velvet scrunchie too. Nice. Perfect for my hair. These people understand thick hair!!!
customer_reviews.author: Rose I. Mogavero

customer_reviews.title: Top notch product has eroded
customer_reviews.text: While new to this manufacturer, we are long acquainted with boar bristle brushes. This brush is well made, solid and fits nicely in our hand which translate to less hand fatigue, Very pleased with this product and will be reordering. Update. Bristles of brush are much softer than when new with light use three times a week. Sellor had promised a "gift" for leaving a review. We left an honest review. Followup? No. Now receiving emails offering brushes for sale, external to Amazon site. Bad trade practices.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent well-made brush/excellent company!
customer_reviews.text: I love how it’s came so fast. The packaging it came in was elegant and clean which is a huge plus! And a nice surprise that you guys added a scrunchie and a comb! This kind of service I will definitely recommend and be back to your site! Thank you for this gift. I also wanted a brush that was durable because I keep buying brushes that the handles break or the middle part comes out! This product is well made. I am very impressed!! Great price and a great product. They also made it easy to bad reviews. You guys are an amazing company! Thanks again From a very happy customer!
customer_reviews.author: Monica Alvarez

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: When I brush my hair, the tiny bristles fall out easily. The main thicker plastic bristles are fine but the thin ones fall out constantly. I have long but not thick hair. I worry that these barely one inch bristles fall out so easily that some could be left in my hair. I have an infant that I worry could be a choking hazard for her while nursing or holding her if one falls onto her or she grabs when she grabs my hair.
customer_reviews.author: Anissa Wiederhold

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful brush but NOT for fine hair!
customer_reviews.text: Beautifully made brush but in no way in this brush intended for fine hair. I love boar bristles on my scalp and I have one that works great with my type of hair but it’s so old and small I needed an update unfortunately this one just isn’t it. The boar bristles don’t even touch my scalp because of the “detanglers” on top. I’m gonna just stick just a soft regular boar bristle brush.
customer_reviews.author: Alannah jones

customer_reviews.title: Would purchase again!
customer_reviews.text: Product looks exactly like photos and they added a cute yellow scrunchy too. I love how sturdy the brush is. My hair is super thick and really crazy right now since the pandemic started. Let’s just say I broke my other brush. So I was looking for a good, reasonably priced brush that could handle my hair. With my other brush, I would brush my hair over 20x and there would still be lots of knots and tangles. I didn’t have to brush my hair 20x with this one. And my hair feels super soft! Love it. Money well spent.
customer_reviews.author: T Winn

customer_reviews.title: My hair loves this hair brush.
customer_reviews.text: This hair brush works excellent on my thick curly hair. I use it right after I wash my hair so even wet it is able to detangling my hair quickly My son who has long hair used it and fell in love with it. I bought him one also because he loved mine so much It is a beautiful brush to look at and easy to hold in my hand. My hair does not feel like it’s getting ripped out like with other hair brushes. I highly recommend this hairbrush if you have long hair like mine That is thick and curly.
customer_reviews.author: Goodtxn62

customer_reviews.title: Quality hairbrush and great customer service
customer_reviews.text: This is a good quality hairbrush at a great price. I’ve actually paid more for cheaper quality brushes at the local drugstore and have thrown them out after a few months. The two types of bristles make for a luxurious brushing experience. The handle is wood and feels solid in your hand. Aside from the nice quality of the brush itself, the item came very nicely packaged in its own box and included a brush cleaner tool and even came with an adorable scrunchi. Very pleased with the company and the great customer service.
customer_reviews.author: phoenix

customer_reviews.title: Great brush, Cleaning tool needs adjustment
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to wait a bit on reviewing this brush because I've had issues with the tips of the nylon bristles coming off on other brushes and wanted to see if this one held up or not. I'm pleased to say that after 4 months, that has not happened with this brush. I also appreciated the cleaning tool, but it is too short and doesn't reach the middle of the brush from any of the sides. Lifting out lint and hair requires coming in at an angle so this makes cleaning the middle of the brush more difficult than it needs to be.
customer_reviews.author: peppergal

customer_reviews.title: Best brush I’ve ever had
customer_reviews.text: I have what I call “hypo-hair” due to hypothyroidism. I had a hard time brushing my hair because of scalp sensitivity, hair breakage, and my hair falling out. This brush is amazing. It is smoother and I have a lot less frizz. I can brush without knots or breakage. It doesn’t irritate my scalp. I cannot recommend this brush enough. Purchased August 2020.
customer_reviews.author: vhaley

customer_reviews.title: Favorite Hairbrush of All Time
customer_reviews.text: This hairbrush is beautiful and sturdy. I have yet to have my hair tangle when using it, and my hair is halfway down my back. I have medium thickness and wavy hair. I recommend getting a metal hairbrush cleaning tool to really get the hair out, but you can get most of it out with your hands or the little cleaning comb that comes with the brush. I bought this brush after I dropped my plastic one and the handle broke off. That is not going to be a problem with this one. I've dropped it a couple of times and it didn't even scratch it. I highly recommend this!
customer_reviews.author: E. Burger

customer_reviews.title: Love this pretty brush!
customer_reviews.text: I have natural curly hair...I recently bought a tool to straighten my hair. I have never been able to get more than thick frizz when I’ve tried before. This company and several videos recommended boars hair to distribute oils. Meanwhile, this triggered a memory of a brush my grandmother brought back from a trip. I used to live to use it to brush my hair and it would look so pretty afterwards...surprise it was a board’s hair bristle. I tried forever to find that brush...little did I know it was boars hair. A fact to share...I have not brushed by hair in 35 years...it disrupts the curl and leaves frizz. I am very excited to us this brush
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: I'd give this for a gift or buy it again. What more can I say?
customer_reviews.text: Overall a solid will buy again when needed, brush is good on its own and the cleaning brush is good with it. On top of being worthwhile already, a scrunchie and super cute although rare use item for me of an I believe to be wooden comb came with my order as well. This arrived in a sturdy box and has become my go to brush, when my intention on purchasing it was the occasional use for softening my hair.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: buy it
customer_reviews.text: The best brush I have ever had in my long life. My hair is wavy, dyed, post-menopausal and sometimes quite frizzy. This brush is a game changer. I don't straighten my hair anymore I brush it in the morning and at night and sometimes in the middle of the day just because I love it so much. It feels like I have some smoothing product on my hair. I don't understand how it works but it really cuts down on the frizzies and flyaways. I really like this product and will buy more for presents.
customer_reviews.author: y

customer_reviews.title: will make your hair smell like urine
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted to love this brush. It works well with my hair, easily removes tangles, it's sturdy, and the rose design is very pretty. but something in the brissles smells like pee. I thought it was me at first, but then my husband noticed it too. I tried spraying it with hair perfume, I tried washing it, everything. and still, it has an odd chemical smell (to be expected out of new products) mixed with the horrible smell of dried pee.
customer_reviews.author: Amber Rose

customer_reviews.title: Comparing to most big brands, it’s a great brush.
customer_reviews.text: It’s a very nice brush, and I love the boar hairs because I always feel like it shines up and softens my hair more after brushing. But compared to brushes I’ve used like this, it’s not that much different. What I love is how big it is for my long hair. If I’m comparing this to detangle brushes like conair, wet brush, tangle teezer, etc, this brush definitely takes the cake!
customer_reviews.author: Crookfam

customer_reviews.title: Great for wavy hair!
customer_reviews.text: I have always had trouble detangling my wavy hair. Usually a lot of my hair ends up being pulled out by regular hair brushes. Decided to try this one after seeing all the good comments and because I thought it looked so cute. It gets my hair shiny and detangled without pulling it all out. Recommend this to everyone I can. I didnt receive the little comb some people did which I was a little bummed about but regardless I like it came with a scrunchie and brush cleaner tool.
customer_reviews.author: Gabriela

customer_reviews.title: Thank God, less tangles
customer_reviews.text: My hair is ridiculously thick, long, and fragile. It tangles at the crook of an eyebrow. God forbid I forget to brush it before bed because I'll be ripping out knots and tangles for 15 minutes the next morning. This brush was totally worth the $12. My hair is looking GREAT after I use it too! Gets tangles out soo much easier and gentler and it's sparing me major split end action. Plus it actually feels GOOD to brush with it. Do your hair a favor and throw your crappy old brush away (it's also SUPER EASY to clean!)
customer_reviews.author: Ketta Roberts

customer_reviews.title: Love it-they send you free gift too.
customer_reviews.text: I loved the reviews. It seems like a durable brush. I have always bought my hair brushes from Ulta but I’m glad I found your product. I will be telling about this hair brush to my sisters, who all have long and strong hair they will love it. Update: they also sent me a free gift for loving their product. I used the hair brush, it’s amazing and very strong for my long and thick hair. I will continue to buy their products.
customer_reviews.author: Ellie

customer_reviews.title: Best brush ever!!!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this brush set for my two daughters who have long thick hair. When they sleep they get horrible knots in the nap of their neck, and doesn’t like to sleep with their hair braided. This brush set has been amazing at removing the knots without them screaming and crying from the pain of removing the knots. We will not use another set again my favorite brush for the whole family
customer_reviews.author: Belinda Adams

customer_reviews.title: Gentle but effective brush
customer_reviews.text: I had a brush similar to this before but was not impressed. I decided to give this type of brush another go. I'm glad I got this one. It's gentle enough on my hair but also manages to untangle my hair. I love that it comes with a little comb to clean my hair out of the brush.
customer_reviews.author: Kat

customer_reviews.title: Effective and economical brush
customer_reviews.text: I have thick and long 4c hair and have been disappointed with brushes that don't seem to brush through the layers in my hair and facilitate a tight wrap (or just even distribution of shine). This gets the job done, did not break the bank (although one day I will have you, completely overpriced, celebrity-endorsed, boar-bristled brush of my dreams!) and has a cute design on the back. Very happy. Now just have to stop my toddler with a brush fetish from constantly running off with it.
customer_reviews.author: meridiannne

customer_reviews.title: Less Breakage
customer_reviews.text: Great brush for my super thick, wavy hair. I've noticed since I started using this brush that my hair looks healthier...how does just a brush help? For some reason there is a lot less breakage when using this brush. I've noticed when cleaning it there is a lot less hair left in the brush. You know those little short hairs on the top of your head that stick straight up? Well, those have lessened quite a bit as well. I honestly don't know why a brush can make so much difference, but it truly does. The strong wood handle is comfortable to hold. It really is an awesome brush!
customer_reviews.author: KrazyK

customer_reviews.title: Love this brush, glides through my hair beautifully!
customer_reviews.text: Hair Brush-[Upgraded] Boar Bristle Hair Brush with Detangling Pins for Thick Curly Long Dry or Wet Hair, Natural Wooden Paddle Detangler Brush for Women Men Adding Shine, Hair Brush Cleaner Included. by Bsisme. Love this brush, glides through my hair beautifully! This is a really nice brush. I like that it has natural boar bristles as well as nylon detangle pins. It works wonderfully. Will be buying another one for the upstairs and keep this one downstairs.
customer_reviews.author: JoJo

customer_reviews.title: Poorly made.
customer_reviews.text: Giving only one star because I have to. After receiving it, I read more reviews and saw the main complaint was too heavy and the bristles fall out every time you use it. True!!
customer_reviews.author: Cheri D. Wheeler

customer_reviews.title: Well worth every penny
customer_reviews.text: This brush is great! Cuts down drastically on frizz, and goes through my hip length hair so well! The cleaninf brush that comes with it, is a life savor too! No bristles came out of the actual brush, even with my hair being so knotty! The details on the brush are super cute too! Love that its wood, cuts down on plastic waste. Even works great on my daughters long, thick hair!
customer_reviews.author: Amver R.

customer_reviews.title: Good genre brush
customer_reviews.text: Love this brush!! I usually buy cheap brushes, ouchless kinds per say, and use them until they fall apart (6-8 years?) I decided maybe I should invest in something that might make my hair less frizz, softer... something. I’ve use this brush a couple of times already (I brush my hair once a day) and it feels so good to use. I’ve also used it on my toddler who usually hates her hair being brushed, but she likes it! And the best part is, when she gets food dried up in her hair, this brush gets it right out with ease. Overall, good brush, I can only hope it lasts a decade, otherwise I will buy another one.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works Well, Smells Awful
customer_reviews.text: This brush smells awful. I’m not sure if I can return it after using it. I didn’t notice it right away. I think it smells more pungent when the bristles get wet (like with wet hair). However, the brush is soft, brushes well, cleans easy, and looks pretty. That being said the smell is unbearable to me. My kids haven’t said a word about it, so I’m debating whether to try and return it.
customer_reviews.author: Camren N.

customer_reviews.title: Amazing brush! Best I’ve ever owned!
customer_reviews.text: I’m certainly grateful this brush is available on Amazon Prime! This brush is the best I’ve ever used! I’ve never ordered a hair brush online but I’m so, glad that I did! The price is absolutely awesome and I was a bit concerned of the quality due to the fact of the small cost. I’m extremely glad I purchased this item! I’d definitely recommend this this & will purchase it again once again when it’s needing to be replaced!
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie A. Wilson ❤️‘s her Amazon Prime Account‼️😉

customer_reviews.title: Works on thick, 6ft long hair
customer_reviews.text: My hair goes past my feet, I struggle to brush and maintain it. This brush made that so much easier, the bristle combination and sturdy wooden handle of the comb makes it easy to get through my thick 6 foot long hair. It takes 5 to 10 minutes now, which is a fraction of what the time used to be. The brush is easy to clean and gets the job done.
customer_reviews.author: HS Mundi

customer_reviews.title: Nope.
customer_reviews.text: When I got it, I felt the bristles with my fingers and several boar bristles just came out in my hand. Very unhappy. Also, the brush cleaner isn’t going to clean anything. Super cheap and ineffective.
customer_reviews.author: Cat

customer_reviews.title: A Miracle Brush.
customer_reviews.text: So THIS is what a good hair brush is supposed to be! I have baby fine curly longish hair that tangles if I stare at it too long. Painful tangles form in my hair. This magical brush removed them easily, with a few strokes of the brush. My hair and scalp feel amazing. Throw away your damned plastic brushes and buy this. I absolutely SWEAR that you will feel and see the difference immediately! And it comes with its own remarkable brush cleaner, too.
customer_reviews.author: carla k

customer_reviews.title: Worth it
customer_reviews.text: I'm not normally one to write reviews or anything, especially about something like a hairbrush. But I'm very tender headed and I can brush my hair while it's wet VERY easily with this brush. I don't even have to grip the hair so it doesn't yank on it. I have 3b hair and this is a really great brush that I bought on a lightning deal impulse because my plastic ones kept breaking.
customer_reviews.author: Emily S.

customer_reviews.title: Great Hair Brush
customer_reviews.text: I have long (to waist) wavy thick hair and LOVE this brush! I've gone through many brushes through the years and this one, so far, is my favorite! It goes through my hair easily and massages scalp. Doesn't pull my hair out like other brushes. Very nice that it came with a little extra too (comb and a hair scrunchie).
customer_reviews.author: Donna

customer_reviews.title: Great for people with curly hair
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this brush on my daughters daily, and I love it. I have straight hair while my wife has curly, so our daughters are in between. Thwir hair gets supper tangled if nit brushed daily. The bush does a great job detangling hair without pulling. The soft brush tips almost feel like a gentle scalp massage every time you brush.
customer_reviews.author: Alexander M

customer_reviews.title: Amazing brush!
customer_reviews.text: I was so amazed with this brush because I had long thick hair anvd I can brush my hair when it's wet without any problem at all but I was so impressed that I ordered two more for Christmas gifts for my twin granddaughters who are 11-1 which hates to brush her hair and I think this will help her not hate her hair so much I can't wait for them to try it. Thank you so much for an awesome brush!
customer_reviews.author: Becky White

customer_reviews.title: The BEST brush for thick Asian hair!!
customer_reviews.text: The best brush for thick Asian hair! Normal brush only gets to the surface of my hair but this one goes all the way to my scalp and also gives really nice shine! I’m so in love with this brush! And the packaging is nice too so it can be a really nice gift as well. I think I will be buying a couple of more for my friends. I’m so happy I gave this one a try!
customer_reviews.author: Yuki

customer_reviews.title: Works on tender heads & doesn’t pull hair
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 12 year old daughter. She is so tender headed and we argue every single time I help with her hair. Brushing her hair is a JOB because it is so thick and tangles really badly. The first time we used the brush she didn’t complain one single time! She could brush her hair as much as she wanted and it went straight through her tangles without stopping. My son took the comb that came with the brush to feel like his big sister so double win! Very happy with this purchase and will be buying more in the future!
customer_reviews.author: Susan Halverson

customer_reviews.title: Really nice brush
customer_reviews.text: I have long, thick hair and shed like a cat. I haven't owned a brush in years since my last one fell apart. I've been using a comb. This brush is wonderful! Hair wet or dry, it never is painful to use, even if my hair has tangles. My hair is soft after brushing as well. The little brush to clean the brush is extremely easy to use and works very well. I'm very happy with the brush and definitely recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Kat T

customer_reviews.title: Soft Brush with Luxury Vibes
customer_reviews.text: The brush came packaged very nicely, and even game with a scrunchie gift. It looks and feels more luxurious than any other brush I've had before. It leaves my dry hair feeling very soft, I don't use it on wet hair so that the wood doesn't have any opportunity to soak in moisture/or warp. The design of the rose on the back is very nice. I've had the brush for months now and it does catch a lot of build up but it can be easily cleaned with a comb. None of the bristles or anything have been damaged or fallen out. I have a lot of fine hair, and this brushes and slightly smooths it nicely.
customer_reviews.author: A Customer

customer_reviews.title: I like having the mix of boar bristle and nylon pins
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this for about a week now, mainly to detangle my hair before drying, I have shoulder length hair. I like having the mix of boar bristle and nylon pins and my hair looks and feels good after brushing, I have had pure bristle brushes in the past and it feels like they just brush the surface of my hair and don't detangle. It also it nice looking on my dresser and came very nicely packaged.
customer_reviews.author: Lucia

customer_reviews.title: HIGHLY RECOMMEND!
customer_reviews.text: Loved how this was packaged. Came with a cute velvet scrunchie too which I wasn’t expecting! For the three items it was a killer deal and the brush works so wonderfully on my hair. I have super thick long hair and this brush is making a big difference already. HIGHLY RECOMMEND!
customer_reviews.author: Cali Cepa

customer_reviews.title: Great brush
customer_reviews.text: This brush is adorable and the extras it came with are great! It's really hard to hold with one hand while I use the other to put my hair into a pony tail. If it was round instead of square that would help, but that's my only complaint. It's great at detangling and works wonders with dry shampoo.
customer_reviews.author: Alyson

customer_reviews.title: This brush both penetrates my thick hair, and smooths it as I brush with it.
customer_reviews.text: I have very thick, long, curly hair. It's difficult to find a brush that's both able to get through it, and yet is still gentle enough to not encourage breakage. It smooths and detangles my hair, without painful pulling or snagging. I'm very pleased- in fact, I'd say that this is the best brush I've ever owned.
customer_reviews.author: Anita Raquel

customer_reviews.title: Very good quality.
customer_reviews.text: I was initially hesitant since it is not 100% boar but the synthetic bristles actually make this brush firmer and ideal for thick hair. It can grab the hair right uptown the scalp. I actually enjoy using it. My only gripe is that the little plastic cleaning tool included is quite useless. I would have liked a wire brush cleaning tool but for this price I am not complaining.
customer_reviews.author: Hina

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE this brush
customer_reviews.text: I have THICK and curly hair. It has always been difficult to brush and I often use a comb with argan oil in it. But its summer here in GA and its getting humid and I need more help. This brush goes thru my hair like butter. I was shocked! (So wish my mom had this when I was a kid). I would highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: Jess W

customer_reviews.title: My all time favorite brush. Ever.
customer_reviews.text: I would give this brush ten stars if I could! Best detangling brush I have EVER owned! I haven't even needed to use the detangling comb that came with it. Even when my hair is wet, it smoothly and easily brushes through my very long hair with ease. I'm a real customer, and I dont get a thing for this review. I just feel like this brush works that well, and I hope other people try it out.
customer_reviews.author: Melanie Warren

customer_reviews.title: Thank you!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Bought the brush for my 8 year old daughter who has long hair. Her hair easily gets tangled. It works!!! Its so easy for her to use. I finally have her brushing her hair every night before bed. The brush has a beautiful flower design which my daughter loves. It's two brushes in one. It's a wide brush so it covers a lot of hair.
customer_reviews.author: Mercedez

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: I love it I mainly bought it for my 5 year old who has curly hair I was having trouble finding a good brush I found this the price was good had good reviews I ended up buying another for myself
customer_reviews.author: Bekah

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful bush and feels so good on the scalp!!!
customer_reviews.text: I loved this brush so much that I bought a second one for myself after buying the first one for my daughter! She also loves her’s 😊 I will definitely buy more in the future. Buy it as it’s great for tangles.
customer_reviews.author: Pickyme

customer_reviews.title: Perfection
customer_reviews.text: I never thought in my life I’d feel the way I do about a hairbrush. I’m in love with this brush. This brush is amazing and exactly what I was hoping for and more. My hair looks amazing and it just glides right through my hair. It also feels amazing on the scalp. I will never buy another brand again!
customer_reviews.author: AMA

customer_reviews.title: Pretty Good Boar Bristle Brush
customer_reviews.text: I liked the boar bristles and the tipped nylon brush surface, but found it was a bit too wide to use in my hand with comfort. I like that it seems to condition my hair. It seems pretty easy to clean with the accompanying cleaner rake. Time will tell whether it holds its bristles without shedding too many. Good price.
customer_reviews.author: R. Walthers

customer_reviews.title: Best Brush I have ever found
customer_reviews.text: Will definitely be buying more. Best brush I have found in years. Update: Have ordered a second brush to have as a back up and will probably order one or two more to have put up jic they run out of these. Absolutely favorite brush ever...and I have spent a pretty penny on other brushes.
customer_reviews.author: Maria

customer_reviews.title: Best Brush EVER
customer_reviews.text: So, I decided to let my hair grow out. I had been keeping it super short because it is very fine and tangles easily. At only about four to five inches long it is already getting tangled. This brush works fantastic to painlessly de-tangle my hair and gives it wonderful shine.
customer_reviews.author: NhewytTop Contributor: Coloring

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product!!
customer_reviews.text: I have always been tender headed and it hurts so bad to brush my hair. Recently I decided to let my hair grow out and the longer it has gotten, regardless of using conditioner, it hurts pretty bad to brush my hair. When I recieved this brush I even used it on my daughter who had bad tangled hair and it smoother hers and my own hair out with very little tugging from the tangles. I'll never purchase another brand of hairbrush from anywhere else. I absolutely love this!
customer_reviews.author: Charles

customer_reviews.title: Lovely brush!
customer_reviews.text: I love this brush, it is gentle enough on my hair that it doesn’t cause breakage but still manage to untangle my knots and doesn’t make my hair frizzy instead making it feel soft. The brush itself is very pretty and there was a brush cleaner as well as a dusty rose scrunchie that came with it.
customer_reviews.author: Rocio B.

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: This item is amazing! Who would think a brush could be so special. It is everything as advertised. It combs out the hair easily, does not pull, and leaves the hair feeling soft and untangled. I would definitely recommend. It's worth the price and is not the average brush purchased at your local drugstore.
customer_reviews.author: JessJane

customer_reviews.title: It’s amazing buy it
customer_reviews.text: First time I’ve ever left a review but this brush changed my life! I have really long (to my butt) hair that’s fine but PLENTIFUL like tons of hair. Typically can take me 10-15 min to brush my hair out while wet but with this brush it took me about 2 minutes. Can’t reccomend it enough. Plus it came with an awesome satin scrunchie and a bristle brush to clean it out. BUY IT
customer_reviews.author: kelly thomer

customer_reviews.title: Nice product
customer_reviews.text: So far it seems very nice! I like the shape of the brush, and it was really nice that it came with the hair-removing tool. That's very handy, and I am sure I will use it. The brush seems solid and not like the bristles will pull out of the brush (that's what happened to my last brush). The design on the back is a nice touch, for sure.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Gerber

customer_reviews.title: The most perfect brush there is
customer_reviews.text: I've been on the hunt for a really great brush and saw this and the reviews and got it. I am SO happy I did. As one reviewer commented, this really is the perfect brush. I have very long hair and this brush detangles like a pro and leaves my hair smoother than before. I really cant believe this is sold at such an great price.
customer_reviews.author: Dana Dane

customer_reviews.title: Amazing hairbrush... no disappointments
customer_reviews.text: I love this hairbrush so much. It seems to restore the natural shine to my hair, easily gets out tangles, works on dry or wet hair, & it helps those stray frizzled strands to stay down! I highly recommend! Oh and if you have a daughter in the house I recommend you buy 2. My 11 year old keeps stealing mine lol
customer_reviews.author: Lace

customer_reviews.title: Best Brush Ever
customer_reviews.text: I was so happy to receive this. It is sturdy, it gets through tangles without pain. It's pretty as well with the etched Rose on the back. I love this brush. You also get a pretty wooden comb, a brush cleaning tool and a surprise gift. I got an awesome scrunchy. I would absolutely buy again!
customer_reviews.author: Angeltat

customer_reviews.title: Thumbs up
customer_reviews.text: The first tome I purchased this item it got lost in the mail but they sent a replacement right away. I love this brush, I have thin hair and I hate brushes that pull out my hair or take away the silkiness. This does neither. I would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Efrati

customer_reviews.title: Little bristles falling out
customer_reviews.text: It tried to make this a three and a half star. But couldn’t. It’s a beautiful brush and not too heavy. I like the way my scalp feels when I brush my hair. My biggest concern is that the little bristles are continually falling out. Whether I’m brushing my hair or cleaning as recommended and according to instructions, the bristles are falling out. How long will this brush last? I’m sadly skeptical.
customer_reviews.author: RENEE

customer_reviews.title: Huge!
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to like this, but this thing is huge! My poor husband ordered it for me for Christmas to replace my well loved brush of about 10 years, but this brush is way too big to use! Quality seems ok, but I'll never really use it and cannot return it without hurting his feelings.
customer_reviews.author: Kristin

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Right out of the box it smells like an old tire, though. I decided to use it anyway. With use the smell faded (my hair did not pick up the tire smell). For the price it's a pretty good brush and my hair is now pretty shiny from using it daily. It's also nice that it comes with a little cleaning brush. If you lose it, a wide tooth comb works just as well.
customer_reviews.author: Wynne C Blue

customer_reviews.title: Brush measurements did not match
customer_reviews.text: The brush I recieved is not as advertised. They have it as 3.2 inches by 9.5 inches but the brush I received is approx 2.4 in x 7.2 inches. I would not have caught this if I wasn't looking at another one. It is a very nice brush but would like to get what I am paying for.
customer_reviews.author: TennisCoachHall

customer_reviews.title: Best brush ever!
customer_reviews.text: I like the feel of the brush in my hand. I have bought several different kinds of boar bristle brushes and they're either too stiff or too lax and don't go through my hair or hurt my head. This brush glides through my hair and feels wonderful.
customer_reviews.author: Katz Blue

customer_reviews.title: AMAIZING!!!
customer_reviews.text: the product is very nicely made, and very nicely packed, and it even came with a nice surprise gift (a nice hair scrunchy that doesn't damage hair) It works very well on my hair and makes them look healthier and the ends look smoother and fuller. 100% recommend it to everybody
customer_reviews.author: Anna

customer_reviews.title: Great for gift giving ....better for keeping
customer_reviews.text: I love this brush! It’s not only beautiful but works like a charm. I have shoulderlength very thick curly hair and I’m able to brush with great ease and it leaves my hair smoother and do you tangled. It comes in a sturdy gift box with a extra special gift included. I bought the brush for myself but it is such a great rush I would certainly give this as a gift.
customer_reviews.author: Betty B Martin

customer_reviews.title: Second only to my Mason Pierson
customer_reviews.text: I have very long hair and this brush goes through smoothly, gently defang,in my hair. I bought it to use in wet hair, but I’m using it when it’s dry too. I love my Mason Pierson brush, but this one is so much more affordable and seems to be just as nice to my hair. The hair brush cleaner is a great extra, too.
customer_reviews.author: Jen Toll

customer_reviews.title: Best brush ever!!
customer_reviews.text: When I needed a new hair brush I didn't want to get some cheap drug store version or pay a fortune for one either. Came across this one and figure what the heck. Glad I did. It is awesome for my long thick hair. I really like the combo of bristles on it. It does not make my hair more static than it already is. It comes in a really nice box-perfect for gift giving. My boyfriend loved the comb that came with it as well.
customer_reviews.author: J. Zimba

customer_reviews.title: Amazing price and awesome product!!
customer_reviews.text: Had no idea it cam with so many things! The brush cleaning tool is a game changer! I’m so excited about it!! The brush is awesome! I have really curly thick hair so I can get some nasty tangles and this brushed handles that really well but it’s still gentle. Really pleased with this.
customer_reviews.author: Rachael

customer_reviews.title: Best brush I have ever used
customer_reviews.text: I bought one of these for my husband who has long hair and it was so good, I bought one for myself. They give you a little gift of hair ties too. Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Dearbhla Klue

customer_reviews.title: Best brush ever!!
customer_reviews.text: I am really loving my new brush.. the way it feels in my hand, the wood is fabulous. My scalp feels wonderfully stimulated as well. My hair looks marvelous, shiny no flyaways!! Couldn't be more pleased.. Highly recommend this beautiful brush!! They put little extras in the box it comes it!! Awesome presentation💜 👍💜 Makes brushing my hair the joy that it should be!! Thank you!!💜💜💜 Great gift anyone would appreciate this beautiful piece!
customer_reviews.author: Russell Lucchi

customer_reviews.title: Smells like dead boar. Yuck.
customer_reviews.text: THIS HAIRBRUSH SMELLS HORRIBLE. Ew. Ew. Ew. I used this for over a week. Then noticed this very funky smell in my hair. I washed the brush earlier today very well with shampoo. But the smell came back tonight. Honestly I didn’t realize it was made from boar hair, until I asked my husband why it would smell so bad. After taking one wiff he concluded it was the stench of the dead animal coming from it. Oh Lord. Don’t buy this brush if you don’t want to smell like a dead pig.
customer_reviews.author: Dasi

customer_reviews.title: Unique Gift.
customer_reviews.text: The paddle style is attractive. The boar hair plus the detangle bristles make the brush very unique. A friend of mine had a worn out brush that looked very similar to your product. Your product was the only one I could find after a very thorough search on the internet that looked anything like the one she had worn out. She loves it. Thanks for the free gift card, plastic comb, and pink velvet scrunchie in the gift box. I selected the wooden comb as the free gift, I hope it matches the brush. I plan to give it to her as well. Thank you Bsisme!!!
customer_reviews.author: SJ Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Shiny, Tabgle-free Long Hair
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves the feel and easiness of this brush. She is now consistently combing ALL the tables out, before giving up. Yay!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great brush with bonus items
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice brush! It came with a cute comb,velvet scrunchie, and a brush cleaner. Smooths the hair instantly. Its 17.97 now but it was 9.99 when I bought it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best brush I’ve ever used.
customer_reviews.text: My 8 year old that screams the moment a brush touches her head ASKED me to brush her hair! Never would have thought I could love a hairbrush this much but I honestly do. It goes through my thick, curly hair with ease and leaves it feeling soft and smooth.
customer_reviews.author: ggwannabe

customer_reviews.title: my life has been changed
customer_reviews.text: I am 30 years old with extremely thin and kinky curly hair (3b) and I didn't know that having my hair brushed *wasn't* supposed to hurt. Yeah. Let that sink in. From the first moment I used this brush I was addicted. I brush my hair and it relaxes me. I feel like I'm being pampered. It's freaking incredible. It's like the brush version of those metal massage claws that you use on your head. I will never go back.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Quality brush
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the brush for my wife. She usually buys some el cheapo brush that falls apart in a month or two. I have waited to see if this brush was going to go down the same road, it has not. This brush is a very quality brush, comes with a little brush to clean it with. If youre looking at this item it is a very very good brush.
customer_reviews.author: Chad

customer_reviews.title: Awesome brush
customer_reviews.text: This is a great brush. My hair is fine and tangles easily. This brush goes through it easily without damaging my hair. No product needed! It also seems to give my hair a nice shine that I didn’t see previously. I can feel it stimulating my scalp. I am super pleased!
customer_reviews.author: KL100

customer_reviews.title: Brush of the gods.
customer_reviews.text: A brush fitting for Thor. This glorious wooden hair mallet glides through even the toughest rats nests. I can’t imagine going back to pedestrian brushes ever again.
customer_reviews.author: WilsónDangerously

product_meta.title: Bsisme Hair Brush-Boar Bristle Hairbrush with Detangling Pins Wooden Paddle Detangler Hairbrush for Women Men Reduce Frizz Dry Restore Natural Shine
feature_bullets: CARE FOR YOUR HAIR : Easily gets through thin to thick hair and detangle knots with ease ,while the boar bristles help distributing natural oil from your scalp down the ends of hair evenly to prevent hair breakage, seal in split ends and reduce frizzy.Daily use for improving hair texture and obtaining healthier,smoother softer and shinier hair

PORTER OF NATURAL POWER : The natural oil which your scalp secrete everyday is the best and most effective natural conditioner.The scale structure of boar bristles is most similar to human hair that can help to spread hair natural oil from the scalp to the tail of hair, heal dry and frivolous hair while removing excess oil to say goodbye to greasy head

CRAFTS of MIXED PRODUCTION : Natural boar bristles can easily remove the dust on the hair, oil ,dandruff and dirt on the scalp, dredge hair cells to avoid blockage.The nylon bristles help to glide through any hair type combing out tangles effortlessly, massages and stimulates your scalp safely, and promotes increased blood flow circulation that may help improve hair growth

HIGH QUALITY EXQUISITE CRAFT:Ergonomic well-polished wooden handle feel comfortable,strong and durable.The elaborate carved rose pattern behind hair brush gives the brush a higher level,add a touch of glamour to your dresser.Regularly clean the hairbrush exten the longevity of your hair brush and retain its nourishing effect

ESCORT FOR YOUR SILKY LOCKS : Indulge your hair to a smooth treatment with the best brush you've ever used which suitable for kinds of hair types.If you’re not impressed,we confidently refund or replace all Bsisme hair brushes within 60-Day, and 1 year assurance for quality. We will always serve you, we sell not only hair brush, but also service.A game changer for hair, worth a try
